item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, November 19, 2024 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Llama 3.1 405B now runs at 969 tokens/s on Cerebras Inference (258 points | 87 comments)
2. Launch HN: Regatta Storage (YC F24) – Turn S3 into a local-like, POSIX cloud FS (410 points | 227 comments)
3. Maslow 4: Large format CNC routing made accessible (92 points | 19 comments)
4. Show HN: FastGraphRAG – Better RAG using good old PageRank (287 points | 75 comments)
5. 20 years of Google Scholar (252 points | 122 comments)
6. Sequin: A powerful little tool for inspecting ANSI escape sequences (33 points | 6 comments)
7. MailCatcher runs a super simple SMTP server (205 points | 70 comments)
8. Hyperfine: A command-line benchmarking tool (84 points | 7 comments)
9. Rats Learned to Drive–and They Love It (128 points | 48 comments)
10. Retro beige PC case goes from April Fools' joke to retail (35 points | 6 comments)
11. The Cosmos Teams with Complex Organic Molecules (4 points | 1 comment)
12. A BBC navigation bar component broke depending on the external monitor (241 points | 100 comments)
13. Two undersea cables in Baltic Sea disrupted (218 points | 425 comments)
14. New textbook teaches students about matrix methods and their real world apps (19 points | 4 comments)
15. Air traffic failure caused by two locations 3600nm apart sharing 3-letter code (202 points | 206 comments)
16. Hyrumtoken: A Go package to encrypt pagination tokens (38 points | 9 comments)
17. The Skyline algorithm for packing 2D rectangles (172 points | 42 comments)
18. Iumenta: A generic framework for animal digital twins (6 points | 1 comment)
19. Ask HN: Anybody used Retool for production, user-facing app? (25 points | 16 comments)
20. Histogramming Bytes with Positional Popcount (28 points | discuss)
21. Is Chrome the New IE? (2023) (244 points | 259 comments)
22. Show HN: Tips.io – A Tailwind playground with AI, page management, and theming (226 points | 54 comments)
23. Reactive HTML Notebooks (322 points | 49 comments)
24. Waiting for many things at once with io_uring (90 points | 20 comments)
25. Bird brain from the age of dinosaurs reveals roots of avian intelligence (107 points | 6 comments)
26. Trieve (YC W24) Is Hiring a software engineer to build OpenAPI tooling ( | hide)
27. LLaVA-O1: Let Vision Language Models Reason Step-by-Step (158 points | 26 comments)
28. Towards Nyquist Learners (59 points | 35 comments)
29. Against Best Practices (243 points | 185 comments)
30. Playful, intricate Japanese leaf art – in pictures – Art and design (33 points | 1 comment)
